title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: download, build and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally on macOS, Linux and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed and pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as an LLM, chat and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick model pulls and prompts from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; supports streaming, embeddings and custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, Docker Compose stacks, GPU tweaks, etc.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper that provides GenServer and LiveView hooks for streaming LLM responses.

title: ollama-napi
summary: Node-API native addon for high-throughput batch inference with Ollama models in Node.js.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate with tokio support for chatting, pulling and embedding via the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that wires Ollama models into a shareable web app in 30 lines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Ask Ollama” command to summarize notes or generate text locally.

title: ollama-keras
summary: Keras 3 callback that streams Ollama-generated text into TensorBoard during training for debug narratives.
